statements: SELECT * FROM TransportationInvestments;
SELECT project_name, benefit_amount FROM TransportationInvestments;
SELECT project_name, investment_cost, net_profit FROM TransportationInvestments WHERE net_profit > 50000;
SELECT * FROM TransportationInvestments WHERE investment_cost < 100000 AND benefit_amount > 75000;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM TransportationInvestments ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM TransportationInvestments WHERE investment_cost > 50000 ORDER BY net_profit DESC;
SELECT project_name, benefit_amount FROM TransportationInvestments WHERE investment_cost BETWEEN 10000 AND 50000;
SELECT project_name, investment_cost, benefit_amount FROM TransportationInvestments WHERE benefit_amount > 30000 GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_id, SUM(investment_cost) AS total_investment_cost FROM TransportationInvestments GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_investment_cost > 100000;
SELECT project_name, net_profit FROM TransportationInvestments WHERE investment_cost = (SELECT MAX(investment_cost) FROM TransportationInvestments);
SELECT * FROM transportation_projects;
SELECT project_name, project_cost FROM transportation_projects WHERE project_cost > 5000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_cost, project_benefit FROM transportation_projects WHERE project_cost < project_benefit;
SELECT project_name, project_cost, project_benefit FROM transportation_projects ORDER BY project_cost DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_cost, team_name FROM transportation_projects JOIN project_teams ON transportation_projects.project_id = project_teams.project_id;
SELECT * FROM transportation_projects WHERE project_cost > 10000 ORDER BY project_cost DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_cost, project_benefit FROM transportation_projects WHERE project_cost BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_cost FROM transportation_projects WHERE project_cost < 5000 OR project_benefit > 15000 ORDER BY project_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%bridge%';
SELECT pt.team_name, pt.team_lead, tp.project_name, tp.project_cost FROM project_teams pt JOIN transportation_projects tp ON pt.project_id = tp.project_id WHERE pt.team_lead = 'John Doe';
SELECT project_name, cost_estimate FROM transportation_projects;
SELECT * FROM project_delays WHERE delay_duration > 30;
SELECT project_id, project_name, cost_estimate, benefit_estimate FROM transportation_projects WHERE cost_estimate > 1000000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, completion_date FROM transportation_projects JOIN project_performance ON transportation_projects.project_id = project_performance.project_id;
SELECT project_name, delay_reason, delay_duration FROM transportation_projects JOIN project_delays ON transportation_projects.project_id = project_delays.project_id;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM transportation_projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, cost_estimate, benefit_estimate FROM transportation_projects WHERE cost_estimate > 50000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, cost_estimate, benefit_estimate FROM transportation_projects JOIN project_delays ON transportation_projects.project_id = project_delays.project_id;

SELECT project_id, project_name, cost_estimate, benefit_estimate, completion_date FROM transportation_projects JOIN project_performance ON transportation_projects.project_id = project_performance.project_id WHERE completion_date < '2021-01-01';

SELECT project_name, SUM(actual_cost) AS total_cost, SUM(actual_benefit) AS total_benefit FROM transportation_projects JOIN project_performance ON transportation_projects.project_id = project_performance.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_cost > 100000;
SELECT * FROM transportation_projects;
SELECT project_name, total_cost FROM transportation_projects WHERE total_cost > 50000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM transportation_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, state, country FROM project_locations WHERE state='California';
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount, investment_date FROM project_investors WHERE investment_amount >= 100000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_projects;
SELECT project_name, total_cost FROM transportation_projects WHERE total_cost > 100000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM transportation_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT p.project_name, i.investor_name, i.investment_amount FROM transportation_projects p JOIN project_investors i ON p.project_id = i.project_id;
SELECT l.location_name, l.city, l.state, p.project_name FROM project_locations l JOIN transportation_projects p ON l.location_id = p.project_id;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT project_id, project_name, actual_cost FROM Project ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT mode_name, mode_description FROM TransportationMode WHERE mode_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT decision_id, decision_date, decision_summary FROM DecisionMaking WHERE project_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project WHERE estimated_cost > 10000;
SELECT * FROM TransportationMode ORDER BY mode_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, actual_cost FROM Project WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT Project.project_name, DecisionMaking.decision_date, DecisionMaking.decision_summary FROM Project JOIN DecisionMaking ON Project.project_id = DecisionMaking.project_id WHERE DecisionMaking.decision_date >= '2022-01-01';
